competition_summary.context: competition law. De Benning v. Costco Wholesale Corp. (Case No. 34-2021-00309030-CU-OE-GDS; Sacramento Superior Court). The Company answered the complaint in January 2022, denying its material allegations. In April 2022, a settlement for an immaterial amount was agreed upon, subject to court approval. The court granted preliminary approval of the settlement on October 28, 2022. A final approval hearing is set for February 10, 2023. In March 2022, an employee filed a class action against the Comp
